name: z-index
longDescription:
For a positioned box, the z-index property specifies:

  1. The stack level of the box in the current stacking context.
  2. Whether the box establishes a stacking context.

auto.description: The stack level of the generated box in the current stacking context is 0. The box does not establish a new stacking context unless it is the root element.

<integer>.description: This integer is the stack level of the generated box in the current stacking context. The box also establishes a new stacking context.
